content:
Based on the interview with C, it appears that when it comes to purchasing board games, there are several factors that are important to them:

* Theme and artwork of the game
* Mechanics and complexity of the game
* Positive reviews from websites like BoardGameGeek
* Convenience and proximity of the board game store
* Impulse buying based on initial attraction to the game

C also mentions that they use BoardGameGeek to research and get information about different games before purchasing, taking into account factors such as the number of players, mechanics, and complexity of the game.
